snippet: The university has plans for technology, academic and retail space on campus and in the surrounding area, and it is considering development of a rail yard near 30th Street Station.
abstract: Drexel University is planning 6.4 million-square-foot hub of sleek new buildings for technology incubators, academic offices and retail space in vision that will vastly contribute to improvements in Philadelphia's central business district, including unused rail yard that has long created dismal urban landscape.
lead_paragraph: The university has plans for technology, academic and retail space on campus and in the surrounding area, and it is considering development of a rail yard near 30th Street Station.

headline.main: Drexel Works to Build Up Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: Drexel Works With Amtrak and Other Agencies to Freshen Up Philadelphia
